channel.title: Hitpoints--HELP
channel.description:
Hi, I own a server and for some strange reason, whenever you die, you spawn with 0 hitpoints! and i have looked around for AGES trying to find out why, the reason i am writing for help is because, when you have 0hp, you can't move :S, i cna fix it temporarily [going into characters and changning hp manually] but it is a real pain, how do i change the hitpoints for when a character respawns?
PLEASE help!!
Thanks =D

item.title: Hitpoints--HELP
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Most servers use a looping process to handle and check if the user is dead called public boolean process or public void procces.which looks something like this.

if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
//teleport
//death method
..ect..
}

find the death method which should be something like youdied().then at the bottom you should add something like this. (which should return they’re hp)

			setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]);
			currentHealth = 99;
			hitDiff = 0;	
			updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

This will most likey differ from what yours looks like.Hope this helps some with your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Hitpoints--HELP
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

You fucker, you said you fixed it…
